subscribe.title: Sign Up for the Zilliz newsletter

header.title: Simply The Fastest Vector Database for AI. Period.
header.subTitle: Powered by Milvus, the world's most popular vector database.
header.subTitle2: 2 collections + 1 million vectors + multiple collaborators for free.

swiper.title: Why Zilliz Cloud is the Top Choice for Enterprise-Level Vector Search.

reliabilityAndScale.title: High performance and reliability at any scale.

easeOfUse.title: Easy to Use
easeOfUse.content: No experience required. You can easily establish a large-scale vector similarity search service in minutes. Stay out of Ops and focus on your business logic.

milvusExpertise.title: Milvus Expertise
milvusExpertise.content: Zilliz Cloud is built by the creators of Milvus. We have deep experience across diverse Milvus use cases, providing state-of-the-art vector database services and solutions.

blazingFast.title: Blazing Fast
blazingFast.content: Our ultra-fast and hardware efficient Zilliz Cloud enables a 10x faster vector retrieval, unparalleled by any other vector database management system.

scalability.title: Highly Scalable
scalability.content: The distributed and high-throughput nature makes Zilliz Cloud a natural fit for serving large scale vector data. You can scale the cluster up to 500 CU, serving tens of billions of items.

availability.title: High Availability
availability.content: With an aim to offer unparalleled customer experience and industry-leading SLAs, Zilliz offers 99.9% monthly uptime for all the products on our cloud.

security.title: Security & Governance
security.content: Data security is always our first priority. Zilliz Cloud complies with the SOC 2 standard and will support Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) soon.

milvusAndCloud.title: Unleash the power of Milvus advanced vector search with Zilliz Cloud.

milvus.title: Why Milvus
milvus.desc: Milvus is the most popular and fastest-growing open-source vector database, with over {{stars}} stars on GitHub and 3.8 million+ downloads. Milvus supports billion-scale vector search with ease, and is trusted by over 1,000 enterprise users.

cloud.title: Why Zilliz Cloud
cloud.desc: Zilliz Cloud provides a fully-managed Milvus service, made by the creators of Milvus. It simplifies the deploying and scaling of vector search applications by eliminating the need to construct and maintain complex infrastructure.

codeExample.title: Build with confidence and supercharge your <0></0>AI applications.
codeExample.desc: Sign up for a free Zilliz Cloud account and grab one of our official SDKs to start. Then, create your first collection and conduct a vector similarity search to power your AI application in minutes, and when you are ready to launch your app, upgrade to a pay-as-you-go plan.
codeExample.tip: *This code is for preview purposes only

techStack.title: Works seamlessly with your tech stack.

buildApplication.title: Start building better vector search applications today
buildApplication.desc: Deploy your vector database on AWS or GCP and start using it in just a few minutes.

101Section.title: Want to learn more about Vector Databases?
101Section.desc: The ever-increasing amount of unstructured data requires a paradigm shift and a new category of database management system - the vector database. But what is a vector database exactly? Find out in this comprehensive guide.

imageSearch.title: LLM Augmentation
imageSearch.desc: Expand LLMs' knowledge by incorporating external data sources into LLMs and your AI applications.

videoSearch.title: Recommender System
videoSearch.desc: Recommend information or products to users based on their past behaviors and preferences.

audioSearch.title: Text/Semantic Search
audioSearch.desc: Search for semantically similar texts across vast amounts of natural language documents.

molecularSearch.title: Image Similarity Search
molecularSearch.desc: Search for visually similar images from a vast collection of image libraries.

textSearch.title: Audio Similarity Search
textSearch.desc: Find similar audio results from massive amounts of audio data such as music, sound effects, and speeches.

dnaClassification.title: Video Similarity Search
dnaClassification.desc: Search for similar videos from extensive collections of video libraries.

qaSystem.title: Question Answering System
qaSystem.desc: Interactive QA chatbot that automatically answers user questions.

recommenderSystem.title: Molecular Similarity Search
recommenderSystem.desc: Search for similar substructures, superstructures, and other structures for a specified molecule.

anomalyDetection.title: Multimodal Similarity Search
anomalyDetection.desc: Query across different modalities such as texts, videos, audio, and images.Â
